rplMib.name: rplMib
rplMib.contactinfo: Kevin Dominik Korte Jacobs University Bremen Email: k.korte@jacobs-university.de Anuj Sehgal Jacobs University Bremen Email: s.anuj@jacobs-university.de Juergen Schoenwaelder Jacobs University Bremen Email: j.schoenwaelder@jacobs-university.de Tina Tsou Huawei Technologies Email: tina.tsou.zouting@huawei.com Cathy Zhou Huawei Technologies Email: cathyzhou@huawei.com
rplMib.description: The MIB module for monitoring nodes implementing the IPv6 routing protocol for low power and lossy networks (RPL). Copyright (c) 2012 IETF Trust and the persons identified as authors of the code. All rights reserved. Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification, is permitted pursuant to, and subject to the license terms contained in, the Simplified BSD License set forth in Section 4.c of the IETF Trust's Legal Provisions Relating to IETF Documents (http://trustee.ietf.org/license-info).

RplMessageType.name: RplMessageType
RplMessageType.description: The type of an RPL control message as defined in Section 6 of RFC 6550.
RplMessageType.reference: RFC 6550: RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for LLNs

RplInstanceID.name: RplInstanceID
RplInstanceID.description: A global or local RPLinstanceID as defined in Section 5.1. of RFC 6550.
RplInstanceID.reference: RFC 6550: RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for LLNs

RplDodagVersionNumber.name: RplDodagVersionNumber
RplDodagVersionNumber.description: The version number of a DODAG as defined in Section 6.3 of RFC 6550.
RplDodagVersionNumber.reference: RFC 6550: RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for LLNs

RplRank.name: RplRank
RplRank.description: The rank of a node within a DODAG as defined in Section 6.3 of RFC 6550.
RplRank.reference: RFC 6550: RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for LLNs

RplObjectiveCodePoint.name: RplObjectiveCodePoint
RplObjectiveCodePoint.description: The Objective Code Point of a DODAG as defined in Section 6.7.6 of RFC 6550.
RplObjectiveCodePoint.reference: RFC 6550: RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for LLNs

RplDISMode.name: RplDISMode
RplDISMode.description: Determines whether a DIS message is send upon boot-up or not as defined in Section 18.2.1.1 of RFC 6550: silent(1) do not send DIS messages send(2) send DIS messages
RplDISMode.reference: RFC 6550: RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for LLNs

RplModeOfOperation.name: RplModeOfOperation
RplModeOfOperation.reference: RFC 6550: RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for LLNs

RplDAODelay.name: RplDAODelay
RplDAODelay.description: The delay time used for aggregation before a DAO message is send.
RplDAODelay.reference: RFC 6550: RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for LLNs

RplDodagPreference.name: RplDodagPreference
RplDodagPreference.description: The preference of a DODAG compared to another DODAG of the same instance as defined in Section 6.3 of RFC 6550.
RplDodagPreference.reference: RFC 6550: RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for LLNs

RplMinHopRankIncrease.name: RplMinHopRankIncrease
RplMinHopRankIncrease.description: The minimal incerease of a rank within a single hop as defined in Section 6.7.6 of RFC 6550.
RplMinHopRankIncrease.reference: RFC 6550: RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for LLNs

RplPathControlSize.name: RplPathControlSize
RplPathControlSize.description: The Path Control Size within a DODAG as defined in Section 6.7.6 of RFC 6550.
RplPathControlSize.reference: RFC 6550: RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for LLNs

rplDefaultDISMode.name: rplDefaultDISMode
rplDefaultDISMode.description: Determines whether a DIS message is send upon boot-up. Changes to this value may not persist across restarts.

rplDefaultDISMessages.name: rplDefaultDISMessages
rplDefaultDISMessages.description: The number of DIS messages that are sent as an initial probe for nearby DODAGs if the DIS mode is 'send'. The value of this object is ignored if the DIS mode is 'silent'. Changes to this value may not persist across restarts.

rplDefaultDISTimeout.name: rplDefaultDISTimeout
rplDefaultDISTimeout.description: The number of seconds after which a node in DIS mode 'send' in the absence of DIO messages may decide to root a floating DODAG. Changes to this value may not persist across restarts.

rplDefaultDAODelay.name: rplDefaultDAODelay
rplDefaultDAODelay.description: The default delay for aggregations before a DAO is send. Changes to this value may not persist across restarts.

rplDefaultDAOAckEnabled.name: rplDefaultDAOAckEnabled
rplDefaultDAOAckEnabled.description: Indicates whether DAO Acknowledgements are sent on this RPL instance. Changes to this value may not persist across restarts.

rplDefaultPreference.name: rplDefaultPreference
rplDefaultPreference.description: The default preference of this DODAG compared to other DODAGs within the same instance. Changes to this value may not persist across restarts.

rplDefaultMinHopRankIncrease.name: rplDefaultMinHopRankIncrease
rplDefaultMinHopRankIncrease.description: The default minimum increase of the rank in a single hop. Changes to this value may not persist across restarts.

rplDefaultMaxRankIncrease.name: rplDefaultMaxRankIncrease
rplDefaultMaxRankIncrease.description: The default maximum allowable increase in rank in support of local repair. If DAGMaxRankIncrease is 0 then this mechanism is disabled. Changes to this value may not persist across restarts.

rplDefaultModeOfOperation.name: rplDefaultModeOfOperation
rplDefaultModeOfOperation.description: The mode of operation of the RPL instance. Changes to this value may not persist across restarts.

rplDefaultIntervalDoublings.name: rplDefaultIntervalDoublings
rplDefaultIntervalDoublings.description: The default Imax parameter of the DIO trickle timer. Changes to this value may not persist across restarts.

rplDefaultIntervalMin.name: rplDefaultIntervalMin
rplDefaultIntervalMin.description: The default Imin parameter of the DIO trickle timer. Changes to this value may not persist across restarts.

rplDefaultRedundancyConstant.name: rplDefaultRedundancyConstant
rplDefaultRedundancyConstant.description: The default k parameter of the DIO trickle timer. Changes to this value may not persist across restarts.

rplActiveInstance.name: rplActiveInstance
rplActiveInstance.description: The currently active RPL Instance. Changes to this value may not persist across restarts.

rplActiveDodag.name: rplActiveDodag
rplActiveDodag.description: The currently active RPL DODAG in the active RPL Instance. Changes to this value may not persist across restarts.

rplActiveDodagTriggerSequence.name: rplActiveDodagTriggerSequence
rplActiveDodagTriggerSequence.reference: RFC 6550: RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for LLNs
rplActiveDodagTriggerSequence.description: The DAO Trigger Sequence Number (DTSN) of the active DODAG as defined in Section 6.3.1 of RFC 6550. Changes to this value may not persist across restarts.

rplOCPTable.name: rplOCPTable
rplOCPTable.description: The table of all supported Objective Code Points (OCPs).

rplOCPEntry.name: rplOCPEntry
rplOCPEntry.description: An entry representing a supported Objective Code Point.

rplOCPEnabled.name: rplOCPEnabled
rplOCPEnabled.description: Enables the usage of this Objective Code Point. Changes to this value may not persist across restarts.

rplInstanceTable.name: rplInstanceTable
rplInstanceTable.description: The table represents information about all known RPL Instances.

rplInstanceEntry.name: rplInstanceEntry
rplInstanceEntry.description: An entry representing information about a RPL Instance.

rplInstanceID.name: rplInstanceID
rplInstanceID.description: The InstanceID of this RPL Instance.

rplInstanceDISMode.name: rplInstanceDISMode
rplInstanceDISMode.description: Reports whether a DIS message is send for this instance upon boot-up.

rplInstanceDISMessages.name: rplInstanceDISMessages
rplInstanceDISMessages.description: The number of DIS messages that are sent as an initial probe for nearby DODAGs if the DIS mode is 'send'.

rplInstanceDISTimeout.name: rplInstanceDISTimeout
rplInstanceDISTimeout.description: The number of seconds after which a node in DIS mode 'send' in the absence of DIO messages may decide to root a floating DODAG.

rplInstanceModeOfOperation.name: rplInstanceModeOfOperation
rplInstanceModeOfOperation.description: The mode of operation of the RPL instance.

rplDodagTable.name: rplDodagTable
rplDodagTable.description: The table represents information about all locally known DODAGs.

rplDodagEntry.name: rplDodagEntry
rplDodagEntry.description: An entry representing information about a DODAG.

rplDodagIndex.name: rplDodagIndex
rplDodagIndex.description: The index identifying a DODAG within an RPL instance. This index is used to keep the table indexes short. The RPL protocol identifies a DODAG within an RPL instance by the DODAGID.

rplDodagID.name: rplDodagID
rplDodagID.description: The identifier of a DODAG root (DODAGID) of this RPL instance. The root of the DODAG reports its own IPv6 address as the DODAG root. This is uniquely identifying a DODAG within an RPL instance.

rplDodagVersion.name: rplDodagVersion
rplDodagVersion.description: The version of the DODAG in this RPL instance.

rplDodagRank.name: rplDodagRank
rplDodagRank.description: The rank of the node within the DODAG.

rplDodagState.name: rplDodagState
rplDodagState.description: The status of the DODAG: other(0) An unknown state. grounded(1) The DODAG is grounded. floating(2) The DODAG is floating (not grounded).

rplDodagOCP.name: rplDodagOCP
rplDodagOCP.description: The Objective Code Point of this DODAG.

rplDodagDAODelay.name: rplDodagDAODelay
rplDodagDAODelay.description: The delay for aggregations before a DAO is send.

rplDodagDAOAckEnabled.name: rplDodagDAOAckEnabled
rplDodagDAOAckEnabled.description: Indicates whether DAO Acknowledgements are sent on this DODAG.

rplDodagPreference.name: rplDodagPreference
rplDodagPreference.description: How preferred this DODAG is compared to other DODAGs within the same instance.

rplDodagMinHopRankIncrease.name: rplDodagMinHopRankIncrease
rplDodagMinHopRankIncrease.description: The minimum increase of the rank in a single hop.

rplDodagMaxRankIncrease.name: rplDodagMaxRankIncrease
rplDodagMaxRankIncrease.description: The maximum allowable increase in rank in support of local repair. If DAGMaxRankIncrease is 0 then this mechanism is disabled.

rplDodagIntervalDoublings.name: rplDodagIntervalDoublings
rplDodagIntervalDoublings.description: The Imax parameter of the DIO trickle timer.

rplDodagIntervalMin.name: rplDodagIntervalMin
rplDodagIntervalMin.description: The Imin parameter of the DIO trickle timer.

rplDodagRedundancyConstant.name: rplDodagRedundancyConstant
rplDodagRedundancyConstant.description: The k parameter of the DIO trickle timer.

rplDodagPathControlSize.name: rplDodagPathControlSize
rplDodagPathControlSize.description: The Path Control Size of this DODAG.

rplDodagParentTable.name: rplDodagParentTable
rplDodagParentTable.description: The list of parents for a DODAG.

rplDodagParentEntry.name: rplDodagParentEntry
rplDodagParentEntry.description: Information about a known DODAG parent.

rplDodagParentID.name: rplDodagParentID
rplDodagParentID.description: An RPL parent associated with this DODAG.

rplDodagParentIf.name: rplDodagParentIf
rplDodagParentIf.description: The interface over which the parent can be reached.

rplDodagChildTable.name: rplDodagChildTable
rplDodagChildTable.description: The list of children for a DODAG.

rplDodagChildEntry.name: rplDodagChildEntry
rplDodagChildEntry.description: Information about a known DODAG child.

rplDodagChildID.name: rplDodagChildID
rplDodagChildID.description: An RPL child associated with this DODAG.

rplDodagChildIf.name: rplDodagChildIf
rplDodagChildIf.description: The interface over which the child can be reached.

rplMemOverflows.name: rplMemOverflows
rplMemOverflows.description: The number of memory allocation failures (e.g., routing table overflows).

rplParseErrors.name: rplParseErrors
rplParseErrors.description: The number of received malformed messages.

rplUnknownMsgTypes.name: rplUnknownMsgTypes
rplUnknownMsgTypes.description: The number of received RPL messages that we dropped because the message type is not recognized by the implementation.

rplSecurityPolicyViolations.name: rplSecurityPolicyViolations
rplSecurityPolicyViolations.reference: RFC 6550: RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for LLNs
rplSecurityPolicyViolations.description: The number of messages discarded because the described level of security for the message type and originator is unknown or does not meet locally maintained security policies as defined in Section 10.7. of RFC 6550.

rplIntegrityCheckFailures.name: rplIntegrityCheckFailures
rplIntegrityCheckFailures.reference: RFC 6550: RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for LLNs
rplIntegrityCheckFailures.description: The number of messages discarded because the integrity check failed against the received message authentication code (MAC) as defined in Section 10.7. of RFC 6550.

rplReplayProtectionFailures.name: rplReplayProtectionFailures
rplReplayProtectionFailures.reference: RFC 6550: RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for LLNs
rplReplayProtectionFailures.description: The number of messages discarded because the received message Counter value is non-zero and less than the maintained incoming Counter watermark or because the received Timestamp Counter value indicates a message transmission time that is earlier than the Current time less the acceptable packet delay as defined in Section 10.7. of RFC 6550. This counter is also incremented if the temporal consistency check of the message fails as defined in Section 10.7.1.

rplValidParentFailures.name: rplValidParentFailures
rplValidParentFailures.description: The number of times a packet could not be sent to a DODAG parent flagged as valid.

rplNoInstanceIDs.name: rplNoInstanceIDs
rplNoInstanceIDs.description: The number of times a packet could not be sent because of a missing RPLInstanceID.

rplTriggeredLocalRepairs.name: rplTriggeredLocalRepairs
rplTriggeredLocalRepairs.description: The number of times a local repair procedure was triggered.

rplTriggeredGlobalRepairs.name: rplTriggeredGlobalRepairs
rplTriggeredGlobalRepairs.description: The number of times a global repair procedure was triggered.

rplNoParentSecs.name: rplNoParentSecs
rplNoParentSecs.description: The number of seconds without a next hop (DODAG parent).

rplActiveNoParentSecs.name: rplActiveNoParentSecs
rplActiveNoParentSecs.description: The number of seconds with packets to forward without a next hop (DODAG parent).

rplOBitSetDownwards.name: rplOBitSetDownwards
rplOBitSetDownwards.reference: RFC 6550: RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for LLNs
rplOBitSetDownwards.description: Number of packets received with the 'O' bit set from a node with a higher rank as defined in Section 18.3.2 of RFC 6550.

rplOBitClearedUpwards.name: rplOBitClearedUpwards
rplOBitClearedUpwards.reference: RFC 6550: RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for LLNs
rplOBitClearedUpwards.description: Number of packets received with the 'O' bit cleared from a node with a lower rank as defined in Section 18.3.2 of RFC 6550.

rplFBitSet.name: rplFBitSet
rplFBitSet.reference: RFC 6550: RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for LLNs
rplFBitSet.description: Number of packets received with the 'F' bit set as defined in Section 18.3.2 of RFC 6550.

rplRBitSet.name: rplRBitSet
rplRBitSet.reference: RFC 6550: RPL: IPv6 Routing Protocol for LLNs
rplRBitSet.description: Number of packets received with the 'R' bit set as defined in Section 18.3.2 of RFC 6550.

rplTrickleTimerResets.name: rplTrickleTimerResets
rplTrickleTimerResets.description: The number of trickle timer resets.

rplMsgStatsTable.name: rplMsgStatsTable
rplMsgStatsTable.description: Basic RPL message statistics by message type.

rplMsgStatsEntry.name: rplMsgStatsEntry
rplMsgStatsEntry.description: Statistics for a specific RPL message type.

rplMsgStatsType.name: rplMsgStatsType
rplMsgStatsType.description: The RPL message type being counted by this row.

rplMsgStatsInMsgs.name: rplMsgStatsInMsgs
rplMsgStatsInMsgs.description: The number of RPL messages received of this type.

rplMsgStatsOutMsgs.name: rplMsgStatsOutMsgs
rplMsgStatsOutMsgs.description: The number of RPL messages sent of this type.

rplFullCompliance.name: rplFullCompliance
rplFullCompliance.description: Compliance statement for implementations supporting read/write access, according to the object definitions.

rplReadOnlyCompliance.name: rplReadOnlyCompliance
rplReadOnlyCompliance.description: Compliance statement for implementations supporting only readonly access.

rplGeneralGroup.name: rplGeneralGroup
rplGeneralGroup.description: A collection of objects providing general information about the RPL implementation.

rplInstanceGroup.name: rplInstanceGroup
rplInstanceGroup.description: A collection of objects providing insight into RPL Instances and RPL DODAGs.

rplStatsGroup.name: rplStatsGroup
rplStatsGroup.description: A collection of objects providing statistics about the RPL implementation.
